review_data.title: Good Shisha & Good Location
review_data.content: Very chill place if you are there at around 17:00 - 20:00 Good Shisha for normal price. Also special Shishas for a higher price but not really worth it. The Service is normally good but they forget to bring new shisha coals and sometimes you...More

review_data.title: Bad service
review_data.content: I ordered melon shisha and it was not bad but I had to wait for charcoal change for more than 20 minutes. The atmosphere was annoying and not comfy at all, too much noise and bad music selection. I will not come back here again.More
